name: Office Run!
description:
Welcome to Office Co! The place that makes all your office dreams come true!

Even in the midst of a pandemic!

But there's one detail that I left out.

All your co-workers have covid.

So it's up to you to keep the company running for as long as possible!

In...Office Run!

Arrow keys to move and jump.

Down arrow to smash.

Enjoy!

:D

-Deliriny2020

Reviews-

10/10- Would get get covid again to play this!-Falcon
